title: Celebs became brokers for the day as part of the annual BGC Charity fundraiser
content:
A-listers took time out of their busy schedules today to work on a trading floor in Canary Wharf as part of the BGC Global Charity fundraiser. 
  
They assisted (or rather tried to) brokers with multi-million pound deals to raise money in memory of those who died in the September 11 twin tower attacks. 
 
In aid of 20 charities, here are the stars who did their bit to help out. 
 Game of Thrones star Emilia Clarke  (Ian West/PA) The ever-animated Jennifer Saunders  (Ian West/PA) Jonathan Ross, of course  (Simon John Owen/PA) Jimmy Carr taking a selfie  (Ian West/PA) A not-so-serious Rio Ferdinand  (Ian West/PA)   
 Share article  
   …but a rather serious Samuel L. Jackson  (Ian West/PA)
